data.event: Many times baseball was the talk around our dinner table and when the new Minnesota Twins baseball franchise first had its game broadcast on the radio in 1960, my dad listened almost religiously.
Baseball here in Cedar County goes back more than 100 years and still has dedicated players and fans.

event.title: A few years ago, I wrote

data.event: A few years ago, I wrote a story about local Cedar County town baseball, "The Boys of Summer" for the Daily News.
A year ago, I decided what a wonderful tribute it would be to my father's family to submit their names for consideration.
Last fall, I was notified - they were in.
Just on Sunday, we accepted a medal of honor for the Bernard Becker family, and no one was probably prouder than my brother and I.I'm sure my dad and uncles were standing right there beside us.
